attributes.action: stop Radio 1 from playing Rhianna - Umbrella, in the hope that it will help stop the rain!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I'm sure many of you know that the "lovely" Rhianna has been number one for 10 weeks. During this time, it has hardly stopped raining. Perhaps if we can get the song banned the rain will stop and we can have at least a bit of a summer

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
